<scxml xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2005/07/scxml"> <datamodel> <data id="x" /> <data id="fac" expr="1" /> </datamodel>
<state> <transition event="calculate" target="loop"> <assign location="x" expr="_event.data['val']" /> </transition> </state>
<state id="loop"> <transition cond="x > 1"> <assign location="fac" expr="x * fac" /> <assign location="x" expr="x-1" /> </transition> <transition target="result"> <log label="'Result'" expr="fac" /> </transition> </state> <final id="result"> <donedata> <param name="fac" /> </donedata> </final> </scxml>
